item.description: Okay I just have a normal convection oven not a fan forced. little worried but I am going to try it anyway.

item.title: By: BAKLAVA CHEF
item.dc:creator: BAKLAVA CHEF
item.description: OMG! This looks so easy to make and delicious. I am going to try this one.
item.content:encoded: OMG! This looks so easy to make and delicious. I am going to try this one.

item.title: By: Lexi
item.dc:creator: Lexi
item.description: Oh wow, that looks awesome. Baklava is definitely on my list of things that I want to try making, although I'm hesitant at the same time because it's kind of daunting considering the amount of sugar and butter that is in the recipe... Was making it time consuming? There's so many layers of pastry to butter...
item.content:encoded: Oh wow, that looks awesome. Baklava is definitely on my list of things that I want to try making, although I’m hesitant at the same time because it’s kind of daunting considering the amount of sugar and butter that is in the recipe… Was making it time consuming? There’s so many layers of pastry to butter…

item.title: By: Katherine
item.dc:creator: Katherine
item.description:
Hi,
I love Baklava but I've never made it myself. Your recipe looks great I think I will go and try it.
Thanks Kath
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I love Baklava but I’ve never made it myself. Your recipe looks great I think I will go and try it.

Thanks
Kath

item.title: By: ArthurX
item.dc:creator: ArthurX
item.description:
Hi Anita,
Nick brought in a few pieces of baklava to have at work and they were awesome.
I showed my mum your post and she was very proud to see her baklava recipe.
Please don't EVER stop cooking, your food is wonderful.
SeeYa,
ArthurX
item.content:encoded:
Hi Anita,

Nick brought in a few pieces of baklava to have at work and they were awesome.

I showed my mum your post and she was very proud to see her baklava recipe.

Please don’t EVER stop cooking, your food is wonderful.

SeeYa,

ArthurX

item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: oh anita. baklava is an absolute favorite of mine and yours is PERFECT. i'm so impressed, and now i'm craving it like nobody's business. :)
item.content:encoded: oh anita. baklava is an absolute favorite of mine and yours is PERFECT. i’m so impressed, and now i’m craving it like nobody’s business. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I love baklava! Good on you for making your own. Grating walnuts does sound nutty, so I can see why you used a processor.
item.content:encoded: I love baklava! Good on you for making your own. Grating walnuts does sound nutty, so I can see why you used a processor.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: oh yum baklava! I love it so much, the flaky pastry, the nutty innards, oh I want I piece so bad, and you've made walnut....hmmm....walnut is only surpassed by pistachio....and you have that on top!
item.content:encoded: oh yum baklava! I love it so much, the flaky pastry, the nutty innards, oh I want I piece so bad, and you’ve made walnut….hmmm….walnut is only surpassed by pistachio….and you have that on top!
